views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11

This tweak removes the 'No Older Notifications' text from the iOS 11 Lock Screen/Notification Center. Enjoy!

Configure options from Settings.

Note: Tested on iPhone SE on iOS 11.3.1. If you have any crashes, freezes etc.. please let me know (you shouldn't have any problems though)

Changes in version 1.3.3 - Added Portuguese (Brazil) language support Changes in version 1.3.2
- Added Italian language support


Changes in version 1.3.1
- Added German language support


Changes in version 1.3.0:
- You can now hide old notifications! Enable in Settings.
- Re-jigged some of the labeling in the Settings menu.
New in version 1.2.0:
- Added Preference menu to Settings
- Added Dutch, Korean and Canadian French language support


Changes in 1.1.0:
- Added French and Spanish languages
- Removed unnecessary comments made by Theos
